name: Flying all the way
description:
This is a small game. The goal of the game is to control the aircraft reasonably and challenge higher scores.

Game players use the mouse to control the aircraft and constantly avoid various obstacles in flight.

The most important test when flying the aircraft is the player's reaction ability. There are many obstacles on the way of flying the aircraft. The player should control it well, otherwise it will hit the obstacles, and the game will end.

Game function

1. In the game, you need to fly an aircraft, constantly shuttle through various obstacles, and the flight speed will gradually increase. How long can you persist?;

2. The game simulation is lifelike, the operation mode is reliable, and you can enjoy the fun of flying in the air;

3. It has incomparable driving experience, but requires players to have certain driving skills.

Game features:

In the game, players can control the aircraft to take risks to avoid various obstacles. The minimalist style of the game screen feels the infinite wonderful in the game, and can challenge at any time. The playing method is very simple and interesting, and the infinite wonderful is here!
